attributes.action: Employers must respond to all candidates with acceptance or rejection
attributes.additional_details: Far too many employers ignore applications and don’t even have the grace to let a candidate know that they have been unsuccessful, forcing people to sit around and wait for news that will never come.
attributes.background: Pass a bill that will make all employers respond to candidates whether they have been successful or had their application rejected

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/705120
